title: FIELD OF BAYONETS - Napoleon Total War Mod Gameplay
description:
FIELD OF BAYONETS - Napoleon Total War Mod Gameplay - Hey guys! Today we are trying out something different. This is a commentary over a live battle.  I am spectating a 2v2 online battle in Napoleon Total War. The French are taking on the British on the Spanish Lakeside.  Enjoy the Battle :D

JOIN MY DISCORD SERVER: https://discord.gg/JjR7UR3

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D

-----------------------------------------PA Merchandise---------------------------------------------
